Texts.Chs: 给你个任务：研究^cyan;半影装备^reset;然后制作一个^orange;飞螳头盔^reset;。我会给你相应奖励，我真的非常需要它。
Texts.Eng: A task for you: Research ^cyan;Penumbrite Equipment^reset; and create a ^orange;Mutavisk Helm^reset;. I'll pay well for it, as I am in dire need.
Bring the ^orange;Mutavisk Helm^reset; to the Novakid by the crew sign at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 谢谢你，我终于可以穿着整套^orange;飞螳装备^reset;在辐射世界中探索了！
Texts.Eng: Thanks to you, I can finally take a trip to an ^orange;Irradiated^reset; world with my complete ^orange;Mutavisk Armor Set^reset;!
